name: Tales Of Ex
description:
Tales Of Ex is a three dimensional platformer that also contains some elements of exploration. 

This game is my first attempt at 3D modelling, texturing and 3D game making in general so any thought on the good & bad of the game is very appreciated.

Just so you know I am planning to update it to at least have a game that has all the menus and so on, but for more levels we will see.
